verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A ruler once came to Jesus by night To ask Him the way of salvation and light; The Master made answer in words true and plain, "Ye must be born again."

verse.name: c
verse.lines: "Ye must be born again, Ye must be born again; I verily, verily say unto thee, Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ye children of men, attend to the word So solemnly uttered by Jesus the Lord; And let not this message to you be in vain, "Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O, ye who would enter that glorious rest, And sing with the ransomed the song of the blest; The life everlasting if ye would obtain, "Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: A dear one in heaven thy heart yearns to see, At the beautiful gate may be watching for thee; Then list to th note of this solemn refrain, "Yes must be born again."
